I had listed 40-50  T206's about 10 days ago , all with El Principe backs..Between here and Ebay (BIN), I have sold a little over 20 of them with 3 still on Ebay......

   I am listing the so far unsold ones with prices to reflect a 12%-15% decrease in prices before going back to Ebay with these lower prices.

For scans, please check the unsold T206 El Principe's on Ebay as I have scans of both front and back of all listed cards....for convenience I have put in  (  ) the Ebay item # for each

FREE SHIPPING pmt by gift or ck pls--770 873 1181 or [url]forazzurri1@aol.com[/url]
thanks 
Bill Latzko
